title: Trump's Triumph and Climate Change
author: Ashwin Misra
intro: - Trump’s win came as a surprise to most of us - Many do not agree on his strong, right wing views on topics such as immigration and social services (healthcare, education) - Trump denies the issue of climate change, which is a major issue facing today’s society, and believes that it is a hoax perpetrated by the Chinese - How will this impact Climate change in America over the coming years?
body_para: - Trump’s specific quotes about climate change, why he denies it - People who are for and people who are against Trump’s views
What the outcome of his policies will mean for our environment
Organizations and charities that serve to reduce the effects of climate change
